setting.value:
Please read this notice very carefully! It has come to our attention that many users have been mistaking TV ADDONS for the official developers of Kodi.
Kodi wasn’t built by us, nor with our add-ons in mind, which aren’t endorsed by the official Kodi development team in any way, shape or form.
Please only visit our web site for add-on support in the future: [B][COLOR white]www.tvaddons.ag[/COLOR][/B]
We’re an unofficial third party development site for add-ons and tools based on open source principles. Please don’t associate Kodi directly with us, out of respect for their development team.
